heroSection.title: Documentation and information center for Antigypsyism, anti-Romaism and Discrimination against Sinti and Roma
heroSection.description: Please report racist incidents to promote a respectful community and combat discrimination

firstStep.title4: What is the gender identity of the affected person?*
firstStep.title5: Which organizations/institutions are affected (Multiple answers possible)?
firstStep.title6: How old is the affected person?
firstStep.title7: How many people are employed in the organization/institution (Paid or voluntary or self-employed)?
firstStep.title8: Did the incident occur over a longer period of time?
firstStep.title11: Where did it happen? Please specify a location
firstStep.validation: Required, Must have a minumum of 3 letters
firstStep.desc: If you are filling out the questionnaire on behalf of a person, it means that you are completing the questionnaire from the perspective of the affected person and according to their self-assessment. If this is not the case and you want to describe a situation where you are providing information as an eyewitness, click the option "Another person" above.

identityOpt.label: I am reporting on behalf of the affected person
identityOpt.name: identity

secondStep.dateCheckbox: It happened over a longer period of time
secondStep.manifestationTitle: Did any of these characteristics, in your opinion, influence the discrimination?
secondStep.otherFormTitle: Is it another form of discrimination?
secondStep.title2: For data protection, we ask you not to provide names of other persons here.
secondStep.textAreaPlaceHolder: Please describe the incident as accurately as possible
secondStep.title4: Description of the incident - What exactly happened?
secondStep.validaton: Required and must have a minimum of 50 letters
secondStep.validaton03: Required and must have a minimum of 3 letters
secondStep.reportingPerson: I hereby confirm that I have entered the information on behalf of the affected person. I have filled out this report form on their behalf and have their consent. All information has been filled out according to the wishes and statements of the affected person.

haveYouReportedOption.label: I have reported the case to the police
haveYouReportedOption.name: haveYouReported
haveYouReportedOption.value: I have reported the case to the police

haveYouReportedOption.label: I have contacted a counseling center
haveYouReportedOption.name: haveYouReported
haveYouReportedOption.value: I have contacted a counseling center

haveYouReportedOption.label: I have reported the incident to another reporting office:
haveYouReportedOption.name: haveYouReported
haveYouReportedOption.value: I have reported the incident to another reporting office:

haveYouReportedDataYesOption: I reported the case to the police
I reported the case to another reporting office, namely:
organization: Where did the discrimination take place?
How was the discrimination carried out?
Who was the attack perpetrated by?
What was antiziganistic about the incident?
What were the effects of the incident on the organization/institution (e.g. social, emotional, material, or financial)?
onBehalf: Where did the discrimination take place?
How was the discrimination carried out?
Who was the attack perpetrated by?
What was antiziganistic about the incident?
What were the effects of the incident on the organization/institution (e.g. social, emotional, material, or financial)?
myself: Where did the discrimination take place?
How was the discrimination carried out?
Who was the attack perpetrated by?
What was antiziganistic about the incident?
andere: Where did the discrimination take place?
Who was the attack directed against?
How was the affected person/group discriminated against?
Who was the attack perpetrated by?
How did you or other witnesses react?
What was antiziganistic about the incident?
